text: == Offseason == * November 1, 1934: Dick Bartell was traded by the Phillies to the New York Giants for Johnny Vergez, Pretzel Pezzullo, Blondy Ryan, George Watkins and cash.Johnny Vergez page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == On July 27, 1935, José "Chile" Gómez made his major league debut with the Phillies and became the team's first Latin-born player. === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {|class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
